Name: Image.Glitch
Desc: Applies a glitch effect to the image using various algorithms.
LongDesc: The Glitch method distorts the image using datamosh, corrupted, macroblock, pixelsort, or wave techniques. It supports extensive configuration for block sizes, angles, noise, and more, enabling creative digital distortion effects.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 320, height: 240 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.Glitch({ type: 'datamosh', counts: 8 }); });
